Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO GOVERNMENTAL EMPLOYEES

Title: Relates to certain honorably discharged veterans
Summary: Provides that a member who first joins a public retirement system of the state on or after April first, two thousand twelve shall pay such retirement system, for deposit in the fund used to accumulate employer contributions, a sum equal to the product of the number of years of military service being claimed and three percent of such member's compensation earned during the twelve months of credited service immediately preceding the date that the member made application for credit; reduces such amount from six percent to three percent.
LawCode: Amd ยง1000, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to certain honorably discharged veterans
